mesquite.categ.lib

Class MolecularDataUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.categ.lib.MolecularDataUtil

  • public class MolecularDataUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class that provides static methods to do various jobs with molecular data

      static double getMeltingTemperature(long[] sequence)
      calculates melting temperature of sequence based upon simple formula presented on http://www.promega.com/techserv/tools/biomath/calc11.htm#disc which is cited as being from Rychlik, W.

      • getMeltingTemperature

        public static double getMeltingTemperature(long[] sequence)
        calculates melting temperature of sequence based upon simple formula presented on http://www.promega.com/techserv/tools/biomath/calc11.htm#disc which is cited as being from Rychlik, W. and Rhoads, R.E. (1989) Nucl. Acids Res. 17, 8543. /*.................................................................................................................
